title: Stock
description: Object describing stock issued by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

stock_class_id.description: Id of StockClass of this stock issuance

stakeholder_id.description: Id of stakeholder that owns this stock

security_law_exemptions.description: List of security law exemptions applicable to this stock and corresponding jurisdictions

share_price.description: The price per share paid for the stock by the holder

shares.description: Number of shares owned by stakeholder of the stock class

vesting_schedule_template_id.description: Pointed to the vesting schedule template applicable to the stock

cost_basis.description: The cost basis for this particular stock

stock_legend_ids.description: List of stock legend ids that apply to this stock

comments.description: List of comments for this stock
